original_title: WhatsApp to release several exciting new features in 2023
original_body_lines: Colombo (News 1st) – In the coming months WhatsApp plans to release a ton of new features.

The messaging app will soon enable you to edit messages, pin a particular message on the chat, 15 duration options for disappearing messages and view once for audio, in an effort to make things more immersive and feature-rich.
These updates are from WAbetainfo, which monitors all of WhatsApp's most recent advancements.
Even though some of these functions are already present on programs like Telegram, WhatsApp users will appreciate their addition.
